about_the_game:
A great tournament is organized in the brand new gameroom : Runner Party!



Runner Party is a local and multiplayer Steam Remote play with diverse mechanics.

A competitive Multiplayer game up to 4 players

In a 80’s and 90’s universe, you can participate in fun races filled with platforms and filled with obstacles.

You will have many items to separate yourself from your opponents and win the race ! Get out of the screen and you will be eliminated !

Be the most responsive to win the race by winning 3 rounds !

Become a legend ! 3 ! 2 ! 1 ! Go !

A competitive Multiplayer game up to 4 players


Runner Party is in early access.
The game will evolve quickly and offer later

- 1 character editor (win and collect cards to get new skins ! Customize your character ! )

- Additional levels
- an AI to play alone
- Servers to play online
- A complete matchmaking system as well as many leagues

Join us on discord !
detailed_description:
A great tournament is organized in the brand new gameroom : Runner Party!



Runner Party is a local and multiplayer Steam Remote play with diverse mechanics.

A competitive Multiplayer game up to 4 players

In a 80’s and 90’s universe, you can participate in fun races filled with platforms and filled with obstacles.

You will have many items to separate yourself from your opponents and win the race ! Get out of the screen and you will be eliminated !

Be the most responsive to win the race by winning 3 rounds !

Become a legend ! 3 ! 2 ! 1 ! Go !

A competitive Multiplayer game up to 4 players


Runner Party is in early access.
The game will evolve quickly and offer later

- 1 character editor (win and collect cards to get new skins ! Customize your character ! )

- Additional levels
- an AI to play alone
- Servers to play online
- A complete matchmaking system as well as many leagues

Join us on discord !

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, CentOS 7 or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2Ghz and more
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Runner Party

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 3220 3,30GHz 2 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 6500 3,60GHz 4 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A competitive Multiplayer running game up to 4 players (either on LAN or online) - Use traps and projectiles ! Make life difficult for your competitors ! - Slow down the enemy to get ahead ! - Get hit and you risk losing the race !
